|brand = Elecom |model = LD-WL11 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = /PCI2 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 06/03/2011 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Elecom_LD-WL11/PCI2 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = B11 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCI |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 1260 |device_id = 3873 |subvendor_id = 13b9 |subdevice_id = b001 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Intersil;; |chip2 = Intersil;; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = b |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== There are two PCI IDs in the driver with the device string '''"Air@Hawk LD-WL11/PCI2 Wireless PCI Adapter"'''.. They are below. *'''<small>PCI\VEN_1260&DEV_3873&SUBSYS_B00113B9</small>''' **1260:3873 (13b9:b001) - Elecom subsystem. This is presumed to be the one used. *'''<small>PCI\VEN_1260&DEV_3873&SUBSYS_38731260</small>''' **1260:3873 (1260:3873) - Dupliation of PCI ID in the subsystem..
==Links of Interest== [http://www.elecom.co.jp/support/download/network/wireless_lan/ld-wl11pci2/index.html Drivers (JP)]
[http://www.scrap-86percent.net/index.php?WiFiChip On the scrap-86percent.net WiFiChip list (JP)]
